org.cloudbus.cloudsim.resources

Class Ram

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.resources.ResourceAbstract
      • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.resources.Ram
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Resource, ResourceCapacity, ResourceManageable

    public final class Ram
extends ResourceAbstract
    Represents the RAM capacity of a PM or VM in Mebabytes.
    Author:
    Manoel Campos da Silva Filho
